runs.comm: slow tossed up delivery on middle. Turn for SS. Rohit nudges to square leg to get off the mark
lots of flight, line is impeccable. Defended
slightly short and flat on middle, Dhawan goes back to punch to midwcket
massive appeal. That one did not turn. flat outside off, Dhawan brings his pad out and leaves. Gets struck outside the line, but no shot offered. Too much doubt to be given
smashed. Gets down early and pummels the sweep to the backward square leg fence. Easy
that didn't turn. Flat outside off, skids on with the arm and sneaks between bat and pad to the keeper
nice start from Dilhara. Full and swinging away, overly full and jammed out
shortish and wide, too close to cut but Rohit chops into the point region
full on off, pushed to mid-off
slower ball on off, good change in pace. Rohit play too early and gets a thick inside edge which squirts to square leg
full on middle and leg, skewed to square leg for a run. Nice shape for Dilhara
full on off, played defensively towards point
slowed up on middle and leg, Dhawan looks to sweep but toe-ends to midwicket
absolutely hammered. Dropped short by SS. Dhawan picks the length early and smashes the pull to deep midwicket
flat on leg, worked to square leg
full and wide, seam-up delivery outside off, cracked away to extra cover
nice delivery. Flat on off, skids on with the arm. Takes the outside edge, on the bounce to slip
slower on middle, worked to midwicket
good length on off, top-of-off stuff. Guided to point
slower ball outside off, pushed to mid-off.
good length on off, defended into the off side
short on leg, Dhawan helps it on its way to the fine leg boundary. Dhawan feigned his advance early, and Dilhara saw it and bounced it in. Bit short on Dhawan's hips is easy pickings
full delivery on off, pushed into the off side
inside edge, just evades the stumps. Full outside off, Dhawan comes down and looks to drive through the off side but is through the shot too early
tossed up on off, heaved to deep square leg. Made terrible connection
top-tier? Wow, what timing from Rohit. Steps out, gets to the pitch and wallops the lofted heave easily over midwicket. Went way into the stands.
good comeback from SS. Sees Rohit coming again, and drops it shorter. Rohit improvises to punch to long-on
defended into the leg side
comes down again, but SS has bowled it flat on off. Punched back
too slow from SS, deceives Dhawan who is through the shot too early. Toe-ended again
poor start. Good length down leg, Rohit helps it on its way to the fine leg fence, with short fine leg up. No problem, for Rohit, easy four.

given. Rohit has to go. Full on middle, straight. Rohit misses his flick and that is absolutely plumb. Looked like the pace of Chameera did for Rohit who was late on it. Great delivery from Chameera though. Great comeback after a poor start
full outside off, left alone
ooh, nice pace. 147 kph. Good length, climbing steeply to it Rahane high on the thigh pad. Off towards point who unnecessarily fires at the stumps to concede an overthrow
with pace comes opportunity. Wayward delivery. Short and wide, in the slot. Rahane laces a cut over point for four. Easily done
slower ball outside off, Rahane fails to connect with his cut. Good change in pace but the line was not great
flat and full on off, Dhawan was looking for a sweep but improvised late and found midwicket with an awkward flick
driven down to long-off this time
lots of flight on middle, good pace for this wicket. But too full and driven to long-on
flat down leg, big appeal but too much doubt again. Dhawan, persistent, with that sweep, misses it this time. A leg bye
flat on middle, worked to square leg
overpitched on off, flicked wristily to midwicket
good length on off, defended nicely
short on middle, pulled with not great timing towards backward square leg. Sufficiently in the gap to get two
slower legcutter outside off, worked towards square leg
nice bumper from Chameera, well directed. But Dhawan plays it well too. Keeps the pull down to square leg
another slower delivery on middle and leg, worked to mid-on
full outside off, guided past point. Towards third man for a run. Rahane wants two, but Dhawan doesn't
flat on off to start, pulled to deep midwicket
rank long-hop down leg, pulled to fine leg for a run
beautiful shot selection and execution. Tossed up on middle, Dhawan gets down low and just taps the reverse sweep pats third man for four. Lovely batting.
worked to deep midwicket with the spin
tossed up on off, pushed easily to long-off, with the spin
flat on off, swept powerfully to square leg
comes in with a medium-pacers action and bowls an offbreak outside off, cut to point for one
offbreak on leg, hits Rahane on the pad
runs in from a medium-pacers run-up and delivers a full offbreak on off stump, worked to long-on
faster delivery on leg, clipped to deep midwicket
deceived by the lack of pace. Another offbreak on off, awkwardly hit to midwicket
pushed to long-off
short, long-hop on leg, pulled to square leg
tossed up on off, defended
comes to the pitch of the flight to push to long-off
flat on middle, clipped to square leg for one
slower on off, a bit of spin takes the outside half towards point
great run. Steal one. Patted towards short cover who is dozing off, quick run
slower delivery on off from around the wicket, pushed back
drilled to long-off
slower offbreak on off, slog attempted, inside-edge onto the pad
chipped to long-off. Backs away and looks to go over cover, but the spin takes the inside-half. Bounces in front of the fielder
nice delivery. Flat on off, the offcutter cuts away from Dhawan's outside edge
clipped to square leg
Dilshan starts with a flat delivery on off which is tapped towards point for one
comes down to drive to long-on
flat on off, Dhawan comes down to cut to point
oh nice, a bit of turn. On off, takes the outside edge towards point
flat on off, pulled to deep midwicket
flat delivery down leg, pulled emphatically to square leg for a run to keep the strike.
full on off, drilled to long-on for a couple.
offbreak on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
Dhawan gets down early to get a  top edge towards fine leg. Dilhara at third man cleans up.
six. Superb shot. Offbreak outside off, Dhawan clears his foot and lofts the drive with the spin over long-off. Over the rope by quite a distance
and that will be it. India win the series 2-1. An easy win in this T20. Full delivery on off, Dhawan hits over cover with the spin again for four. India's biggest win, in balls remaining.
